data.eml:eml: Salamandridae) using molecular and morphological data. Revalidation of the taxon Pleurodeles nebulosus (Guichenot, 1850)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Carranza, Salvador, Wade, Edward (2004): Salamandridae) using molecular and morphological data. Revalidation of the taxon Pleurodeles nebulosus (Guichenot, 1850). Zootaxa 488: 1-24, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.157836
